name: Frankedolly
description:
A weird little game with creepy art style and infinite replayability.

Controls (Keyboard):

  • WASD/Arrows to move or change menu selection
  • Space/Enter to confirm selection and replay
  • Esc to exit to main menu

Controls (Xbox Controller):

  • (D-pad) to move or change menu selection
  • (A) to confirm selection and replay
  • (B) to exit to main menu

This was a team entry for GCC Game Jam 2018.

Team:
Zainab Al-Ansari (Programmer/Lead Designer)
Fatima Al-Ansari (Audio Engineer)
Eman Almusawi (Artist/Musician)
